item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，好市多正在向中国大陆供应商施压，要求他们降价
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引两家供应商的话报道称，好市多批发公司（Costco Wholesale）正在向中国大陆的供应商施压，要求他们降价以应对美国的关税。【原文：Costco Wholesale is pressuring suppliers in mainland China to cut prices in response to U.S. tariffs, The Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing two suppliers.】

item.title: 尼古拉-坦根连任挪威财富基金首席执行官
item.description: 挪威中央银行周二表示，尼古拉-坦根（Nicolai Tangen）已被任命连任挪威庞大的主权财富基金挪威银行投资管理公司（Norges Bank Investment Management）首席执行官。【原文：Nicolai Tangen has been appointed to a second term as CEO of Norway's vast sovereign wealth fund, Norges Bank Investment Management, the central bank said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 新市场和廉价 SUV 使 XPeng 季度收入好于预期
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商新鹏汽车周二预计第一季度营收将高于预期，该公司押注于推出价格较低的 G6 和 G9 SUV 车型以及进军欧洲市场。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker XPeng on Tuesday forecast first-quarter revenue above estimates, betting on the launch of its lower-priced G6 and G9 SUV models as well as its foray into European markets.】

item.title: 乌克兰顶级电信公司赴美上市，估值超过 20 亿美元
item.description: 乌克兰领先的移动运营商 Kyivstar 的母公司 VEON 周二表示，尽管唐纳德-特朗普总统混乱的贸易政策打击了华尔街的信心，但该公司仍在推进其美国上市计划。【原文：Ukraine's leading mobile operator Kyivstar is moving ahead with its planned U.S. listing, its parent VEON said on Tuesday, even as President Donald Trump's chaotic trade policy knocks confidence on Wall Street.】

item.title: 随着美国啤酒饮用量下降，大麦种植者开始担心关税问题
item.description: 蒙大拿州的大麦种植者米奇-科宁（Mitch Konen）在俯瞰白雪皑皑的落基山脉的偏远农场里打包干草和装载拖车时，逾期未还的贷款和不断增加的利息常常让他感到压力山大。【原文：Overdue loans and mounting interest payments often weigh on Montana barley grower Mitch Konen as he bales hay and loads trailers at his remote farm overlooking the snow-capped Rocky Mountains.】

item.title: 美联储会议召开前，期货市场难寻方向
item.description: 周二，在美联储即将召开会议之前，美国股指期货一直在努力寻找方向，人们将密切关注美联储就当前关税争端对经济的潜在影响发表的评论。【原文：U.S. stock index futures struggled for direction on Tuesday ahead of the Federal Reserve's upcoming meeting that will be closely monitored for commentary from the central bank on the potential economic ramifications of ongoing tariff disputes.】

item.title: 美联储会议召开前，期货市场难寻方向
item.description: 周二，在美联储即将召开会议之前，美国股指期货一直在努力寻找方向，人们将密切关注美联储就当前关税争端对经济的潜在影响发表的评论。【原文：U.S. stock index futures struggled for direction on Tuesday ahead of the Federal Reserve's upcoming meeting that will be closely monitored for commentary from the central bank on the potential economic ramifications of ongoing tariff disputes.】

item.title: 债券投资者为美国经济放缓做好准备
item.description: 考虑到美联储并不急于恢复降息，债券投资者正在为美国经济衰退做好准备，因为他们正在缩减风险敞口，同时许多投资者正在延长其固定收益投资组合的期限。【原文：Bond investors are bracing for a U.S. economic downturn, as they pare back risky exposures, while many are extending duration in their fixed-income portfolios, taking in to account a Federal Reserve that is in no rush to resume cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 金融科技公司和加密货币公司寻求银行特许以促进发展
item.description: 据半打以上的行业高管称，金融科技公司和加密货币公司正在寻求成为州银行或国家银行，以期在他们认为更有利于行业发展的特朗普政府领导下拓展业务。【原文：Financial technology firms and crypto companies are seeking to become state or national banks in a bid to expand their business under the Trump administration that they view as more industry-friendly, according to more than half a dozen industry executives.】

item.title: 美联储观察家认为资产负债表缩减很有可能发生变化
item.description: 华尔街对美联储缩减资产负债表的前景不断变化，现在再次出现了变化，一些银行和研究人员认为，美联储很有可能在本周的政策会议上进一步放缓或暂停缩减资产负债表的努力。【原文：Wall Street’s ever-shifting outlook on the reduction of the Federal Reserve’s balance sheet is once again in flux, with a number of banks and researchers now seeing a good chance the central bank may slow further or pause the effort at this week's policy meeting.】

item.title: 苹果公司在德国反垄断上诉中败诉，为加强控制打开大门
item.description: 德国联邦法院周二裁定，苹果公司对监管部门的一项评估提出上诉，要求这家 iPhone 制造商在德国接受更严格的监管，但苹果公司败诉。【原文：Apple lost an appeal on Tuesday against a regulatory assessment that opens the iPhone maker up to stricter controls in Germany, the Federal Court of Justice ruled on Tuesday, following years of debate over the company's market position.】

item.title: 奥迪权衡提价以减轻美国关税打击
item.description: 大众汽车公司周二表示，该公司旗下高端品牌奥迪正在权衡是否通过提价将美国进口关税成本转嫁给客户，并表示预计今年将就北美本地化生产做出决定。【原文：Volkswagen's premium Audi brand is weighing whether to pass on the costs of U.S. import tariffs to customers through price increases, it said on Tuesday, adding it was expecting a decision this year on localising production in North America.】

item.title: Meta 矢志在澳大利亚大选前遏制虚假内容和深度伪造行为
item.description: Facebook 和 Instagram 的所有者 Meta Platforms 周二表示，其在澳大利亚的独立事实核查计划将有助于发现和删除虚假内容和深度伪造，因为该公司的目标是在 5 月全国大选前遏制错误信息。【原文：Facebook and Instagram-owner Meta Platforms said on Tuesday its independent fact-checking program in Australia would help detect and remove false content and deepfakes, as it aims to curb misinformation ahead of a national election due by May.】

item.title: 信贷收紧、富裕家庭支出放缓可能进一步影响美联储的前景
item.description: 股市暴跌和信贷紧缩的迹象可能会使美联储本周的工作变得更加困难，因为美国央行的决策者们将试图权衡消费者支出是否会因家庭评估其净资产可能受到的打击和获得贷款更加困难而受到影响。【原文：Tumbling stock markets and signs of tightening credit may make the Federal Reserve's job even more difficult this week as U.S. central bank policymakers try to weigh whether consumer spending will suffer as households take stock of the potential blow to their net worth and greater difficulty in obtaining loans.】

item.title: 独家报道盖茨警告白宫他无法弥补美国全球卫生资金的缺口
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，比尔-盖茨正亲自游说特朗普政府官员继续资助全球范围内的医疗卫生项目，从儿童疫苗接种到艾滋病治疗，并警告说他的基金会不能插手填补缺口。【原文：Bill Gates is personally lobbying Trump administration officials to keep funding health programs worldwide, from childhood vaccination to HIV treatment, and warning that his foundation cannot step in to fill gaps, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 英伟达有望在大会上披露最新人工智能芯片的细节
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋预计将在本周二举行的年度软件开发者大会上透露该公司最新人工智能芯片的最新细节。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang is expected on Tuesday to reveal fresh details about the company's newest artificial intelligence chip at its annual software developer conference.】

item.title: 英伟达有望在大会上披露最新人工智能芯片的细节
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋预计将在本周二举行的年度软件开发者大会上透露该公司最新人工智能芯片的最新细节。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang is expected on Tuesday to reveal fresh details about the company's newest artificial intelligence chip at its annual software developer conference.】

item.title: 高盛：鉴于工资前景，日本央行将逐步加息
item.description: 根据高盛（Goldman Sachs）最近的估计，日本央行可能会继续逐步加息，因为工资上涨的速度将使通货膨胀率稳定在 2% 的目标附近。【原文：The Bank of Japan is likely to keep hiking interest rates gradually as wages are seen rising at a pace that will keep inflation stably around its 2% target, according to recent estimates made by Goldman Sachs.】

item.title: 小米第四季度营收增长 48
item.description: 受电动汽车和智能手机销售强劲的推动，中国小米公司周二公布第四季度收入增长 48.8%。【原文：China's Xiaomi reported a 48.8% rise in fourth-quarter revenue on Tuesday, boosted by strong electric vehicle and smartphone sales.】

item.title: 三星因人工智能芯片故障而面临股东质询，股价下跌
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）将于本周三召开艰难的年度股东大会，股东们对三星电子未能搭上人工智能热潮的顺风车感到沮丧，而人工智能热潮使三星电子成为去年表现最差的科技股之一。【原文：Samsung Electronics is set for a tough annual general meeting on Wednesday with shareholders frustrated by its failure to ride a boom in artificial intelligence that made it one of the worst-performing tech stocks last year.】

item.title: 腾讯利用开源 3D 生成工具推进人工智能发展
item.description: 科技巨头腾讯周二发布了一套新的人工智能工具，能够将文本和图像转换成三维视觉效果，这是中国在生成式人工智能领域发展势头的最新例证。【原文：Tech giant Tencent on Tuesday unveiled a suite of new artificial intelligence tools capable of converting text and images into 3D visuals in the latest example of growing Chinese momentum in the field of generative AI.】

item.title: 滴滴报告收入增长 7.1%，第四季度转为亏损
item.description: 中国打车公司滴滴出行周二报告称，第四季度营收增长7.1%，达到529亿元人民币（73.2亿美元），该公司从监管部门对其业务的全面整顿中复苏的步伐正在加快。【原文：China's ride-hailing company Didi Global reported on Tuesday a 7.1% rise in fourth-quarter revenue to 52.9 billion yuan ($7.32 billion), as the company's recovery from a regulatory overhaul of its operations gathered pace.】

item.title: 腾讯音乐娱乐季度收入超预期
item.description: 腾讯音乐娱乐周二公布的季度营收超出分析师预期，连续第二个季度实现增长，原因是流媒体服务的强劲需求帮助该公司在长达一年的增长放缓后实现反弹。【原文：Tencent Music Entertainment topped analysts' estimates for quarterly revenue on Tuesday with its second straight quarter of growth as strong demand for its streaming service helped the company bounce back after a year-long slowdown.】

item.title: 中国小米将 2025 年电动汽车交付目标提高到 35 万辆
item.description: 中国小米公司创始人雷军周二在微博中表示，将全年电动汽车交付目标提高到 35 万辆，高于今年早些时候制定的 2025 年 30 万辆的目标。【原文：China's Xiaomi raised its full-year target for electric vehicle deliveries to 350,000, founder Lei Jun said on Tuesday in a Weibo post, up from 300,000 EVs for 2025 set earlier this year.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Pine Labs 首席执行官表示，目标是在 2025 年下半年在印度上市
item.description: 印度金融科技公司 Pine Labs 首席执行官阿姆里什-劳（Amrish Rau）表示，该公司正计划于 2025 年下半年在国内进行首次公开募股，目前疲软的市场环境并未使其退缩。【原文：Indian fintech firm Pine Labs is planning a domestic initial public offering in the second half of 2025 and is undeterred by the current weak market conditions, chief executive Amrish Rau said.】

item.title: "牛市崩溃 "促使美国股票配置出现有史以来最大跌幅 - 美国银行
item.description: 美银全球研究公司（BofA Global Research）周二对投资者进行的一项调查显示，由于对滞胀、贸易战和美国例外论终结的担忧，3月份美股配置出现了有史以来的最大跌幅，投资者情绪出现了 "牛市崩溃"。【原文：Allocation to U.S. stocks saw the biggest drop ever in March with concerns over stagflation, trade wars and end of U.S. exceptionalism driving a "bull crash" in sentiment, a survey of investors from BofA Global Research showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行推动解决银行资本机制的薄弱环节
item.description: 瑞士国家银行（Swiss National Bank）周二表示，在瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）于 2023 年倒闭后，瑞士银行业资本制度的薄弱环节仍需加以解决，并支持政府为使该行业更加稳健所做的努力。【原文：Weaknesses in the capital regime for the Swiss banking sector still need to be addressed after the 2023 collapse of Credit Suisse, the Swiss National Bank said on Tuesday, backing government efforts to make the industry more robust.】

item.title: 中国《环球时报》警告：美国将受到其他国家 "高关税 "的冲击
item.description: 中国国家媒体警告说，随着其他国家以 "高关税 "回击美国商品，美国的关税将对美国经济造成重大损害。【原文：U.S. tariffs will inflict significant harm on the U.S. economy as other countries hit back with "high tariffs" on American goods, Chinese state media warned, leaving the door open for more measures by Beijing as another wave of levies looms.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行在 2024 年购买价值 12 亿瑞士法郎的外汇
item.description: 瑞士央行周二表示，瑞士国家银行将在2024年购买价值12亿瑞士法郎（13.6亿美元）的外汇，在控制通货膨胀后大幅减少干预措施。【原文：The Swiss National Bank bought foreign currency worth 1.2 billion Swiss francs ($1.36 billion) in 2024, the central bank said on Tuesday, dramatically reducing its interventions after bringing inflation under control.】

item.title: 解说员：比亚迪等中国汽车制造商为何推出快速充电电动车系统？
item.description: 中国比亚迪发布了兆瓦级充电系统，称其充电速度与给电动汽车加满油一样快，并表示将在全中国建立网络，从而引发一场新的超级充电竞赛。【原文：China's BYD has unveiled a megawatt charging system that it says can charge an EV as quickly as filling up a fuel tank, and said it will build a network across China, igniting a new super charging race.】
